Articles.Content:
Is it just broken for me?

And if not, is somebody who can fix it aware of it?

Unable to confirm. It seems to work in both Firefox and Chrome on my XP box.

In the mean time, may I suggest a dedicated client (irssi, Chatzilla, xchat, etc) for IRCing?

Wow, that was a good tip.

Seems like Opera doesnt like the Client.
Seems to be working for me. (Also, moved to Kerbal Network.)
